#summary This function clears the cache.

Pass in the `category` argument to only clear the items of a specific type (action, partial etc).

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| category || no || string || || "action", "partial" or "query" ||

*Examples:*

{{{
<cfset clearCache()>
}}}

{{{
<cfset clearCache("partial")>
}}}

See the section on [Caching] for more information and code examples.
